Name: Chill Corner
About the game: Please wishlist to get news in the future! This is just an idle game for chillout and relaxing. Features: Beautiful rooms with chilling atmosphere and weather Many lo-fi, acoustic and other genre of music for chilling, relaxing or focusing Customizing your character and pets Taking a rest by do several in game quest Decorating your room Creating and manage your task Creating and customize your favorite playlist
